title: Fastest First Freshener Goat Birth EVER Filmed!

tasks.task: ** Tending to newborn goat kids during birth and postpartum care
subtasks: ** Observe the labor progress and assist when needed.
** Prepare items (puppy pads, towels) for the birthing area.
** Assess the position of hooves and nose for a smooth delivery.
** Monitor the contraction and pushing efforts of the mother goat.
** Assist in the delivery of multiple babies (note: instinctively knew there were more than one).
** Clean the newborns to ensure airways are clear.
** Comfort the new mother and ensure she focuses on nursing.
** Ensure proper feeding (first nursing session) for the newborns.
** Manage the mother's initial insecurities with the newborns.
** Provide supplementary feeding as needed to support the mother and newborns.
